name: Cosvilkeh
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues influence; local pidgin for sailors
strong tide-based ancestor rites at low tide
diet: salted fish, seaweed preserves, spice-preserved goods
constraints: no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
long-range mind-influence rare and institutionally banned
notes: small coastal outpost centered on reagent transshipment
population and formal state ties undocumented
